final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph Owner
        OA[Request for compensation] -.->|Document| A
        E -.->|Fees notice| F
        F -.->|Payment| G
    end

    subgraph Tribunal
        A[Compensation Request Received] --> B[Retrieve related file]
    end

    subgraph Cashier
        B --> C[Check compliance]
        C --> D{XORGateway}
        D -->|fees not paid| E[Produce fees notice]
        E --> F[Update request]
        F --> G[Check fee payment]
        D -->|fees paid| G
        G --> H{XORGateway}
        H -->|additional fees required and paid| I[Generate receipt for additional fees]
        I --> H
        H -->|fees paid| J[Allocate hearing date]
        J --> K[Hearing date allocated]
    end

    subgraph Owner
        OA -.->|Document| A
        OA -.->|Document| E
        E -.->|Fees notice| F
        F -.->|Payment| G
    end
